title: Hanging, 1926–27
medium:
Medium:  wool embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered using stem, chain, buttonhole, herringbone, satin and roumanian stitches on plain weave foundation
inscribed: Made for Selda and Ralph Jonas in the year Nineteen Hundred and Twenty Six and the Year Nineteen Hundred and Twenty Seven by Marguerite Zorach
description: Square embroidered hanging depicting a family, with a seated woman and infant at the center, a young boy behind them, a man on the right side and a woman on the left. A large tree in the upper left and a cityscape in the upper right corner, with small animals in the foreground. In browns, oranges, pinks, and neutrals on a natural linen ground.

tombstone.epitaph:
Hanging, 1926–27.
1926–27. Medium:  wool embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered using stem, chain, buttonhole, herringbone, satin and roumanian stitches on plain weave foundation. Gift of Richard H. Frost. 1996-112-1.
